text: Pentastelma is a genus of liana in family Apocynaceae, first published as a genus in 1974. It contains only one known species, Pentastelma auritum, endemic to the Island of Hainan in China.Flora of China Vol. 16 Page 253 白水藤 bai shui teng Pentastelma auritum Tsiang & P. T. Li in Chun et al., Fl. Hainan. 3: 577. 1974. The species is listed as critically endangered.China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Pentastelma auritum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. ==References== Category:Asclepiadoideae Category:Endemic flora of China Category:Monotypic Apocynaceae genera Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
